snippet.title: Launch Teaser Beyond the Void - Official release Steam - Oct 24th, 2018
snippet.description:
Beyond the Void is a new hybrid strategy game in space. It brings the MOBA genre with its RTS origins back together in a 1 vs 1 space war. 

Blog post: https://beyond-the-void.net/launch-teaser-for-the-release-on-october-24th/

Beyond the Void is a unique combination of strategy, action, and competition. Take off to a new galaxy and experience the thrill of being a Captain! Pick your mothership and draft its skills. You’ve got only one true goal: design your own strategy and forge your invincible fleet to conquer your opponent’s home planet! 
Now, Captain, board your mothership, balance your strategy and resources to lead the war and take control of the Ambrosium. Become the next Warlord!

FREE TO PLAY ON PC. 
Available for download on STEAM now (early access) with an OFFICIAL RELEASE scheduled on OCT 24th, 2018. 

Innovation: sale of decentralized game items on the online store. Players have complete control over their game items, rather than just a right of use.
Check our store (beta) here: 
https://shop.beyond-the-void.net/home


Editing: Louis Barra
Music: Fabien Blémet
